Name: Magical Wooden Plank
Desc: A magical wooden plank of unknown use. Simply taking it with you will make you feel full of power.
EffectDesc: All items' productivity +10%

Name: Selected Gift Bamboo Shoots
Desc: Delicious bamboo shoots. It's said that many would even accept an expensive bundle deal just to get them.
EffectDesc: All items' prices +10%

Name: Non-Alcoholic Beverage
Desc: Business talks should come after wine. (Note: This product does not contain alcohol. Please drink in moderation.)
EffectDesc: All buildings' construction prices <color=#FF0000>-15%</color>

Name: Ancient Parchment
Desc: Despite the weather-beaten look, it was actually buried last week.
EffectDesc: Free Constructions <color=#FF0000>+1</color>

Name: Roses in Hands
Desc: An artware inspired by the famous saying, "Giving roses to others leaves a fragrance in your hands." But it seems the creator only named their work with the key words of this sentence.
EffectDesc: All buildings' construction prices <color=#FF0000>-5%</color> every after a quarter

Name: Giftbox Workbench
Desc: A workbench where holiday zongzi giftboxes are packed. You can earn a good salary if you work hard at this workbench.
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Coconut</color> productivity <color=#FF0000>+15%</color> but price <color=#16D100>-5%</color>

Name: Recruitment Material
Desc: An advertising picture for recruitment. It uses the most common figure to show the low recruitment requirements.
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Wood</color> productivity <color=#FF0000>+15%</color> but price <color=#16D100>-5%</color>

Name: Work Notebook
Desc: A notebook that belongs to a customer service staff member of a chamber of commerce with some music scores written by the owner.
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Petroleum</color> productivity <color=#FF0000>+15%</color> but price <color=#16D100>-5%</color>

Name: Delicious Zongzi
Desc: A common food sold at a cheap price after the holiday period to clear out stock.
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Coconut</color> productivity <color=#FF0000>+15%</color> but stock limit <color=#16D100>-10%</color>

Name: Nutritional Tablets
Desc: The latest nutritional meal replacement tablet. One tablet is enough to fill you up. The ideal staff lunch for a factory.
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Wood</color> productivity <color=#FF0000>+15%</color> but stock limit <color=#16D100>-10%</color>

Name: Eternal Love
Desc: A frozen flower that can allegedly preserve the love between lovers, provided that you can always keep cool in difficult times.
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Petroleum</color> productivity <color=#FF0000>+15%</color> but stock limit <color=#16D100>-10%</color>

Name: Beautiful Bowknot
Desc: One of the standard decorations of a chamber of commerce. It's said that it can help vendors sell more goods.
EffectDesc: All items' final prices +2. These price bonuses can be critical.

Name: Beginner's Manual
Desc: The beginner's manual of a chamber of commerce. On the first page, it reads A Merchant Prepares, the name of the manual.
EffectDesc: Golden Shells from [Exploring] <color=#FF0000>+30%</color>

Name: Cheering Stick
Desc: A cheering stick taken away from a pair of twins. It's not harmful, but babies could eat it by mistake.
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Coconut</color> price <color=#FF0000>+5%</color>; additional <color=#FF0000>+8%</color> with 3 or more City Missions completed

Name: Ever Spinning Top
Desc: When your hand is empty, draw a card.
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Wood</color> price <color=#FF0000>+5%</color>; additional <color=#FF0000>+8%</color> with 3 or more City Missions completed

Name: Snowman Cookie
Desc: A snowman-shaped cookie with "Strauss" on the back. Perhaps it would sell better if they made it into a snowflake.
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Petroleum</color> price <color=#FF0000>+5%</color>; additional <color=#FF0000>+5%</color> with 3 or more City Missions completed

Name: Abandoned Violin
Desc: A violin that has been abandoned. Its owner now works as the bass player of a girl band.
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Coconut</color> productivity <color=#FF0000>+5%</color>; additional <color=#FF0000>+10%</color> when Main City reaches Lv.5 or higher

Name: Question Mark Puzzle Piece
Desc: It's hard to tell where this puzzle piece should go, but this is one of the goals of the game, isn't it?
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Wood</color> productivity<color=#FF0000>+5%</color>; additional <color=#FF0000>+10%</color> when Main City reaches Lv.5 or higher

Name: Toy Firefly
Desc: A small toy a parent made during noon breaks as compensation for not being able to watch fireflies with their kid due to work.
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Petroleum</color> productivity<color=#FF0000>+5%</color>; additional <color=#FF0000>+8%</color> when Main City reaches Lv.5 or higher

Name: "Seed" - Abandoned
Desc: A magical item obtained by praying to the wishing well. The fairy called it the "seed." Is she from some advanced alien civilization?
EffectDesc: All items' stock increases by 10% at the beginning of the next quarter. The corresponding items will be destroyed during the round right after the effect is activated.

Name: Drink Machine
Desc: It's not like I can't find a team. I just like the drink machine too much.
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Coconut</color> productivity <color=#FF0000>+2%</color> for each City Star

Name: Tree Stump
Desc: Logger!
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Wood</color> productivity <color=#FF0000>+2%</color> for each City Star

Name: Petroleum Tunnel
Desc: In one ear and out the other.
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Petroleum</color> productivity <color=#FF0000>+2%</color> for each City Star

Name: Speed-Up Teddy Bear
Desc: A magical teddy bear that makes time go faster. Recommended for anyone who hates work.
EffectDesc: All items' productivity +20%

Name: Chamber of Commerce Candies
Desc: Candies given out to customers at the entrance of the market. Those who have it tend to have a better mood and purchase more.
EffectDesc: All items' prices +20%

Name: Holiday Giftbox
Desc: A holiday giftbox containing 4 zongzi. Though expensive, it's the best gift you can bring home on holiday.
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Coconut</color> productivity <color=#FF0000>+25%</color> but price <color=#16D100>-10%</color>

Name: War Drum
Desc: Just put it there and it will speed up your production lines. It can also boost your workers' efficiency if you hit it.
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Wood</color> productivity <color=#FF0000>+25%</color> but price <color=#16D100>-10%</color>

Name: Overtime Ticket
Desc: Parents can use it to work also on holidays instead of playing with their kids, but who would use it?
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Petroleum</color> productivity <color=#FF0000>+25%</color> but price <color=#16D100>-10%</color>

Name: Old Knight Sword
Desc: The best-selling sword among some people. Seems to have gone through a lot of battles. Mind that the red color is a dye, not blood.
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Coconut</color> productivity <color=#FF0000>+15%</color> and price <color=#FF0000>+2</color>

Name: Observer's Telescope
Desc: An advanced telescope that can keep working with enough solar power. Don't ask why a telescope needs power.
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Wood</color> productivity <color=#FF0000>+15%</color> and price <color=#FF0000>+1</color>

Name: Secret Poem
Desc: A collection of poems. It's said that anyone who can crack the secret in it will understand how the poet sees the world.
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Petroleum</color> productivity <color=#FF0000>+15%</color> and price <color=#FF0000>+4</color>

Name: Magic Conch
Desc: Why don't you ask the magic conch?
EffectDesc: All items' price fluctuation upper limit +5% and lower limit +5%

Name: Vision Telescope
Desc: A famous old merchant mentioned that new merchants should have vision in his speech, and this telescope was sold out on the same day.
EffectDesc: All items' price fluctuation upper limit +15% but lower limit -8%

Name: Panda Combo
Desc: A meal set for kids and for adults!
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Coconut</color> and <color=#a46800>Wood</color> production CRIT rates <color=#FF0000>+5%</color>

Name: Poem Beyond Bonds
Desc: A common music score with a song that starts with poetry recitation.
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Wood</color> and <color=#a46800>Petroleum</color> production CRIT rates <color=#FF0000>+5%</color>

Name: Storage Jar
Desc: One of the most common solution containers researchers use. Due to its good humidity resistance, some also use it as a salt container.
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Coconut</color> and <color=#a46800>Petroleum</color> production CRIT rates <color=#FF0000>+5%</color>

Name: Heating Device
Desc: Heat your food before you have it!
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Coconut</color> and <color=#a46800>Wood</color> sale CRIT rates <color=#FF0000>+5%</color>

Name: Magical Die
Desc: "I got a 1! Great!" "Let me remind you again. We're playing DND."
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Wood</color> and <color=#a46800>Petroleum</color> sale CRIT rates <color=#FF0000>+5%</color>

Name: Sakura Token
Desc: A token inspired by the name of the Sakura Chamber of Commerce with the sakura petal element. The holder can request help from the organization.
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Coconut</color> and <color=#a46800>Petroleum</color> sale CRIT rates <color=#FF0000>+5%</color>

Name: Fortune Bag
Desc: An item sold at a discount with unknown products inside. But everyone knows that the seller always makes a profit.
EffectDesc: All items' final prices +4. These price bonuses can be critical.

Name: Signed Movie Still
Desc: A movie still, signed by a famous actor from the Golden Age. Perhaps someone would construct a few buildings for you in exchange for this.
EffectDesc: Free Constructions <color=#FF0000>+2</color>

Name: Red Bean Paste Mooncake
Desc: Red bean paste mooncakes are the best. Five nuts ones just don't cut it.
EffectDesc: All items' sale CRIT effects +40% but sale CRIT rates -20%

Name: Five Nuts Mooncake
Desc: Five nuts mooncakes are the best. Red bean paste ones just don't cut it.
EffectDesc: All items' sale CRIT effects -40% but sale CRIT rates +20%

Name: Shield Axe
Desc: Let's go!
EffectDesc: Every 3 quarters, top seller item's price <color=#FF0000>+30%</color> in the current round

Name: Wand
Desc: Disclaimer: By purchasing and using this wand, you will NOT be granted magic power. Complaints regarding this issue will not be addressed.
EffectDesc: If your gross sales in a single quarter exceed 50000 Golden Shells, all items' final prices +3 permanently (Only once)

Name: It's a Twist
Desc: Two negatives make a positive.
EffectDesc: When an item's price fluctuation <color=#FF0000>is not greater than 0</color>, that item's productivity <color=#FF0000>+15%</color>

Name: It's a Positive
Desc: Two positives still make a positive. Surprise!
EffectDesc: When an item's price fluctuation <color=#FF0000>is greater than 0</color>, that item's sale CRIT <color=#FF0000>+10%</color>

Name: Overlord Badge
Desc: You want to see the secretary of Babylonia, but I'm the Overlord.
EffectDesc: When you sell more than <color=#FF0000>2</color> types of items at the same time, a random item's price <color=#FF0000>+30%</color>

Name: Minion's Statue
Desc: A strong effect comes with a cost. Do you remember what you produced in the last quarter?
EffectDesc: When you produce an item that was <color=#FF0000>not produced</color> in the last quarter, productivity <color=#FF0000>+40%</color>

Name: Veggies and Fruits
Desc: Hahaha, have some fresh veggies and fruits!
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Coconut</color> productivity <color=#FF0000>+0.5%</color> for each 1% Coconut production CRIT rate bonus (without counting in items' base stats)

Name: Composite Parts
Desc: A machinery part in perfect condition. If only it was made of gold.
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Wood</color> productivity <color=#FF0000>+0.5%</color> for each 1% Wood production CRIT rate bonus (without counting in items' base stats)

Name: Kowloong Jade Pendant
Desc: A delicate Kowloong jade pendant handmade by the best Kowloong craftsman. This is just a counterfeit.
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Petroleum</color> productivity <color=#FF0000>+0.5%</color> for each 1% Petroleum production CRIT rate bonus (without counting in items' base stats)

Name: Organic Vegetables and Fruits
Desc: Fresh, nutritious, organic vegetables and fruits—anything with these words can be sold at a higher price.
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Coconut</color> price <color=#FF0000>+0.5%</color> for each 1% Coconut sale CRIT rate bonus (without counting in items' base stats)

Name: Charging Cube
Desc: This one used to have a more straightforward name—"battery."
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Wood</color> price <color=#FF0000>+0.5%</color> for each 1% Wood sale CRIT rate bonus (without counting in items' base stats)

Name: Salted Fish Thrust
Desc: Abstract art is art!
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Petroleum</color> price <color=#FF0000>+0.5%</color> for each 1% Petroleum sale CRIT rate bonus (without counting in items' base stats)

Name: Hand-Shaped Rice Cake
Desc: A hand-shaped golden dried rice cake. It's said some would even drive hundreds of kilometers just to taste it.
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Coconut</color> productivity <color=#FF0000>+5%</color> for each Main City Level

Name: Sequence Parts
Desc: Do young parts dream of ancient mechanical giants?
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Wood</color> productivity <color=#FF0000>+5%</color> for each Main City Level

Name: Mona Lica
Desc: Allegedly the authentic work of the beautiful Overlord. Its date remains unknown.
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Petroleum</color> productivity <color=#FF0000>+5%</color> for each Main City Level

Name: Item Placeholder
Desc: Item Placeholder
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Petroleum</color> productivity <color=#FF0000>+5%</color> for each Main City Level

Name: Magical Industrial Oil
Desc: Also known as the lubricating oil. It can make your production facilities run smoother.
EffectDesc: With this Artifact, all items' productivity +5% every after a quarter

Name: Storage Hardware
Desc: Although it sounds impressive, it's actually just a USB flash drive with a big capacity.
EffectDesc: <color=#FF0000>15%</color> discount when purchasing areas

Name: Katana
Desc: Wait, bro, what does this have to do with <color=#a46800>Coconuts</color>?
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Coconut</color> price <color=#FF0000>+3%</color> for each City Star

Name: Hand Saw
Desc: Yes, bro, you can use it to chop wood.
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Wood</color> price <color=#FF0000>+3%</color> for each City Star

Name: Fusion Cannon
Desc: Bro, no! <color=#a46800>Petroleum</color> must be kept away from fire!
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Petroleum</color> price <color=#FF0000>+3%</color> for each City Star

Name: Chakarat Fertilizer
Desc: With Chakarat, you can grow tons of <color=#a46800>Coconuts</color> on a tiny patch of farmland!
EffectDesc: For every <color=#FF0000>500</color> units of <color=#a46800>Coconuts</color> produced, <color=#a46800>Coconut</color> productivity <color=#FF0000>+10%</color>, up to <color=#FF0000>+50%</color>

Name: Ice
Desc: Flash forward to chop faster.
EffectDesc: For every <color=#FF0000>1000</color> units of <color=#a46800>Wood</color> produced, <color=#a46800>Wood</color> productivity <color=#FF0000>+10%</color>, up to <color=#FF0000>+50%</color>

Name: Pretty Gold Nugget
Desc: <color=#a46800>Petroleum</color> is gold. Gold is <color=#a46800>Petroleum</color>.
EffectDesc: For every <color=#FF0000>100</color> units of <color=#a46800>Petroleum</color> produced, <color=#a46800>Petroleum</color> productivity <color=#FF0000>+10%</color>, up to <color=#FF0000>+50%</color>

Name: Shark-Speare Head
Desc: I'm not afraid of anything anymore.
EffectDesc: For every <color=#FF0000>500</color> units of <color=#a46800>Coconuts</color> sold, <color=#a46800>Coconut</color> price <color=#FF0000>+10%</color>, up to <color=#FF0000>+50%</color>

Name: Sage's Toy
Desc: My best friend.
EffectDesc: For every <color=#FF0000>1000</color> units of <color=#a46800>Wood</color> sold, <color=#a46800>Wood</color> price <color=#FF0000>+10%</color>, up to <color=#FF0000>+50%</color>

Name: Magic Girl Wand
Desc: Miracles, magic... they are real.
EffectDesc: For every <color=#FF0000>100</color> units of <color=#a46800>Petroleum</color> sold, <color=#a46800>Petroleum</color> price <color=#FF0000>+10%</color>, up to <color=#FF0000>+50%</color>

Name: Rush Order
Desc: I know you want it now, but please calm down.
EffectDesc: All items' productivity +30%

Name: Enameled Plum Blossom
Desc: Why do you say it's expensive? The price hasn't changed for years.
EffectDesc: All items' prices +30%

Name: Klein Bottle
Desc: A bottle that only exists in a higher dimension. It's so mind-blowing that no one realizes you are cutting down the price.
EffectDesc: <color=#FF0000>30%</color> discount when purchasing areas

Name: Lotus Mooncake
Desc: Actually, lotus mooncakes are the best!
EffectDesc: All items' production CRIT rates +10%

Name: Limited-Edition Shell
Desc: Out-of-production shells! Serial number 00001! Now available at wholesale price!
EffectDesc: All items' sale CRIT rates +10%

Name: Shark-Saparilla Coconut Drink
Desc: The best coconut drink ever!
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Coconut</color> productivity <color=#FF0000>+8%</color>, price <color=#FF0000>+8%</color>, production CRIT rate <color=#FF0000>+5%</color>, sale CRIT rate <color=#FF0000>+5%</color>

Name: Prototype Parts FT-01
Desc: It has been enchanted with a magical spell, making it impossible to open from the outside for disassembly.
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Wood</color> productivity <color=#FF0000>+8%</color>, price <color=#FF0000>+8%</color>, production CRIT rate <color=#FF0000>+5%</color>, sale CRIT rate <color=#FF0000>+5%</color>

Name: Drum Set
Desc: The drum set left by a legendary drummer whose catchphrase is "What?" It's said that it will automatically play Chun Ri on the loop.
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Petroleum</color> productivity <color=#FF0000>+8%</color>, price <color=#FF0000>+8%</color>, production CRIT rate <color=#FF0000>+5%</color>, sale CRIT rate <color=#FF0000>+5%</color>

Name: Heart Protection Mirror
Desc: Not a magic mirror. Won't show you any beautiful people.
EffectDesc: All items' price fluctuation upper limit +15% and lower limit +15%

Name: Fate
Desc: Fate, stay tonight.
EffectDesc: All items' price fluctuation upper limit +50% but lower price limit -30%

Name: "Magic Lamp"
Desc: Make a wish to the genie, only to be informed that prices have risen.
EffectDesc: All items' final prices +8. These price bonuses can be critical.

Name: B.O.O.M.
Desc: Namo Gatlin Bodhisattva. Boom!
EffectDesc: When you sell <color=#FF0000>3</color> types of items at the same time, a random item's sale CRIT <color=#FF0000>+100%</color>

Name: Sage's Statue
Desc: A strong effect comes with NO cost. If there is a cost, it's not strong enough.
EffectDesc: When you produce an item that was <color=#FF0000>not produced</color> in the last quarter, production CRIT <color=#FF0000>+100%</color>

Name: Shark-Speare Badge
Desc: The ultimately rare one. You must pray for three days before you can get it in gacha.
EffectDesc: Every 3 rounds, all items' production CRIT +100%

Name: Five-Star Medal
Desc: As the famous critic Mike Sr. writes: Very good medal. Makes me a five-star corporal.
EffectDesc: All items' fluctuation upper limits are locked at 50%

Name: Trailblazer Badge
Desc: An oddly familiar badge. It makes you want to ask "How old are you?"
EffectDesc: All items' productivity +5% for each Main City Level up

Name: Memorandum of Cooperation
Desc: Only four words on it: Give me some money.
EffectDesc: All items' price +5% every time when a City Mission is completed

Name: Magic Doll - Abandoned
Desc: A special doll that makes people want to purchase things.
EffectDesc: All items are guaranteed to be sold at the quarterly price fluctuation upper limit

Name: Red Pendant
Desc: The sale CRIT rate increases along with the production CRIT rate
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Coconut</color> sale CRIT rate <color=#FF0000>+0.5%</color> for each 1% Coconut production CRIT rate bonus (without counting in items' base stats)

Name: Blue Pendant
Desc: The sale CRIT rate increases along with the production CRIT rate
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Wood</color> sale CRIT rate <color=#FF0000>+0.5%</color> for each 1% Wood production CRIT rate bonus (without counting in items' base stats)

Name: Yellow Pendant
Desc: The sale CRIT rate increases along with the production CRIT rate
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Petroleum</color> sale CRIT rate <color=#FF0000>+0.5%</color> for each 1% Petroleum production CRIT rate bonus (without counting in items' base stats)

Name: Guitar
Desc: This guitar belongs to the guitarist of Shin-Kawasaki Vocational School. It grants a bonus when playing the song Void.
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Coconut</color> production CRIT rate <color=#FF0000>+0.5%</color> for each 1% Coconut sale CRIT rate bonus (without counting in items' base stats)

Name: Microphone
Desc: This microphone belongs to the truant lead vocalist of Shin-Kawasaki. It grants a bonus when playing the song Void.
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Wood</color> production CRIT rate <color=#FF0000>+0.5%</color> for each 1% Wood sale CRIT rate bonus (without counting in items' base stats)

Name: Keyboard
Desc: This keyboard belongs to the legendary keyboardist Tomo. Although it's not Tomori, it doesn't hurt to pay more attention to the drums.
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Petroleum</color> production CRIT rate <color=#FF0000>+0.5%</color> for each 1% Petroleum sale CRIT rate bonus (without counting in items' base stats)

Name: Bottle Cap
Desc: It has the potential to become a currency, though it's better that it never does.
EffectDesc: All items' productivity +4% for each City Star

Name: Black Card
Desc: Gold and black - colors of the rich.
EffectDesc: All items' prices +4% for each City Star

Name: Law of Cycles
Desc: Multiplication will descend here!
EffectDesc: All items' productivity, regardless of the source, is modified to 120% of the original value

Name: Cycle of Laws
Desc: Multiplication will descend here!
EffectDesc: All items' prices, regardless of the source, are modified to 120% of the original value

Name: S-Rank Manager
Desc: Overseeing things here is only a hobby. The real job is saving the world.
EffectDesc: All items' productivity +3% for each building on the map

Name: Coin
Desc: Here, take it and leave. Don't disturb me! I need to make money!
EffectDesc: All items' prices +3% for each building on the map

Name: Evil Scythe
Desc: Contains the magical power to boost production. It does look pretty evil, though.
EffectDesc: Every <color=#FF0000>2</color> rounds, <color=#FF0000>production </color>+1

Name: "Aquamarine" - Abandoned
Desc: Why keep so much stock? It's not like it's going to reproduce... Wait, what?
EffectDesc: All items' current stock +5% at the beginning of every quarter

Name: "Ring" - Abandoned
Desc: A ring that is fitting for the elder, therefore it's called the Elder Ring.
EffectDesc: All items' productivity, regardless of the source, is modified to 110% of the original value

Name: "Crown" - Abandoned
Desc: A symbol of the thief who robs the rich to feed the poor. It has a new meaning after the thief gave it to you.
EffectDesc: All items' prices, regardless of the source, are modified to 110% of the original value

Name: Four-Dimensional Pouch - Abandoned
Desc: The pouch the old craftsman carries with him. It holds various magical tools.
EffectDesc: Obtain an extra Artifact when getting an Artifact through [Exploration]

Name: Lucky Golden Shell - Abandoned
Desc: With it, you'll be even luckier than the lucky landlord.
EffectDesc: Chance to get high-quality artifact significantly increased

Name: Idea King's Jade Pendant - Abandoned
Desc: The jade pendant claimed to be precious by the "Idea King" vendor. But it doesn't look like jade.
EffectDesc: No special effects

Name: Dead Merchant's Belongings - Abandoned
Desc: A box that holds the dead merchant's belongings, and perhaps his longing for his family before death.
EffectDesc: No special effects

Name: Tenet
Desc: A great will rises high above the island!
EffectDesc: Production <color=#FF0000>+3</color>

Name: Friend-Ship
Desc: "May capsize anytime."
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Petroleum</color> production CRIT effect <color=#FF0000>+50%</color>

Name: Small Green Bottle
Desc: It's said that the fluid in it can make plants grow fast.
EffectDesc: <color=#a46800>Coconut</color> and <color=#a46800>Wood</color> production CRIT rates <color=#FF0000>+30%</color>

Name: Mallet
Desc: Made by a female engineer on the team who loves explosions.
EffectDesc: A pretty useless souvenir.

Name: Courage
Desc: No courage, no progress.
EffectDesc: Production <color=#FF0000>+1</color>

Name: Lonely Sheet Music
Desc: The sheet music of the lonely guitarist girl—the Lonely Sheet Music!
EffectDesc: All items' productivity +50%
